lang.author: Maplespe
lang.inituifail0: MiaoUI library Initialization failed! error code:
lang.initfail0: Note that due to DWM Authorization Isolation restrictions, the application must be placed in a non-user directory, and the path cannot be in "{path}" or its subdirectories! Please change the directory.
lang.symloadfail: Loading symbols file failed! The program could not load the dll, please download the symbols again! (Symbols may also need to be re-downloaded after a system update)
lang.installsucs1: The installation was successful! But you haven't downloaded a valid symbol file yet, download it from the "Symbols" page to make it work!
lang.loadfail: Failed to load component! Error message:
lang.oldBtnHeight: Reduce title bar button height (win7 style)
lang.symtip: Symbol files (pdb) are files that record debugging information about a program. Since systems vary from version to version, you will need to download the symbol files from a Microsoft server. If you update your system, you may need to download the new file again.
lang.symdownfail: Download failed! Unable to download file from "msdl.microsoft.com".
lang.syminvalid: Symbol file is invalid! Please go to the "Symbols" page of the DWMBlurGlass program to download a new symbol file!
lang.importwarn: Importing a configuration file will overwrite your existing configuration, continue?
lang.restorecfg: Are you sure you want to restore the default configuration?
lang.aboutinfo: This program is based on the LGPLv3 agreement free open source software:
